sources.title: Radar Men from the Moon - 1952 - All Episodes - TV Serial - Maraton - Chapters 1-12

When strategic sites on Earth start popping like flashbulbs, inventor‚Äëhero Commando Cody traces the mystery blasts to Retik, the calculating Ruler of the Moon. Cody, with Joan Gilbert and Ted Richards at his side, blasts off in a streamlined rocket to confront Retik‚Äôs plan to ‚Äúsoften up‚Äù Earth using lunarium‚Äëpowered ray tech. Back home, Cody duels Retik‚Äôs on‚ÄëEarth agent Krog and human heavies Graber and Daly through airborne dogfights, cafe dust‚Äëups, and cliff‚Äëside pursuits. A second trip to the Moon nets Cody a captured ray cannon and the proof he needs to turn the tide. With the clock ticking on a full‚Äëscale lunar relocation, Cody aims his jet‚Äëpack skills and brainy gadgets at shutting down Retik‚Äôs grand design once and for all.

sources.title: Radar Men from the Moon (1952) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: George D. Wallace, Aline Towne, Clayton Moore
Directed by: Fred C. Brannon

When strategic targets on Earth are destroyed by a mysterious force, it's time to call civilian researcher and inventor Commando Cody.

metadata.Plot: Strategic targets on Earth are being destroyed by an unknown weapon. Government security head Henderson suspects it's an "atomic ray" originating from the moon! He assigns Commando Cody, scientist and man of action with a secret flying suit, to investigate. Soon, Cody is battling Earth thugs in the pay of Krog the moon man and making trips in his experimental rocket to the moon itself, in a perilous and all but singlehanded effort to thwart the planned invasion of Earth.
metadata.Actors: George D. Wallace, Aline Towne, Roy Barcroft
